== Interface Design Ideas for UME ==
This page is created as a coalescence point for new ideas for the UME graphical interface. Please add your ideas/links here!

=== Possible Ideas and Examples ===

==== eyeos ====
This is a web based HTML interface. The use of a small webserver running on the mid and providing both interface and network services could provide a compelling platform for media/file sharing, work group/productivity, and web integration.

http://eyeos.org/en/
